title: Something lurks deep in the sea...

replies.body:
OH MY GOSH I just played with this skin it is one of the BEST in the games!!!! Awesome awesome work Riot, LOVE it!!! The voice is cool as! 
Can't fault it.. and the piranha thing in her ult is sick as!!!! Yay!! So happy!! Awesome details!!
Nami is love , Nami is life <3 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
That ult is actually really cool, nice colour skin too
Shoulda called her skin, wait for it.... 'Deep Tsea Nami'
Im a Nami main :D     but i dont have RP ;-;    {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{champion:267}}
Deep skin Nami is so cool{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
